verses.verse: Putting away<WG659> therefore<WG3767> all<WG3956> wickedness<WG2549>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> guile<WG1388>, and<WG2532> hypocrisies<WG5272>, and<WG2532> envies<WG5355>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> evil speakings<WG2636>,
as <WG5613> newborn<WG738> babes<WG1025>, long<WG1971> for the spiritual<WG97> milk1051, Leviticus50 which is without guile<WG2443>, that ye may grow<WG837> thereby unto salvation<WG846>;
if ye have<WG1512> tasted<WG1089> that<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> is gracious<WG5543>:
unto <WG4314> whom<WG3739> coming<WG4334>, a living<WG2198> stone<WG3037>, rejected<WG593> indeed<WG3303> of<WG5259> men<WG444>, but<WG1161> with<WG3844> God<WG2316> elect<WG1588>, precious<WG1784>,

ye <WG846> also<WG2532>, as<WG5613> living<WG2198> stones<WG3037>, are built up<WG3618> a spiritual<WG4152> house<WG3624>, to be a holy<WG40> priesthood<WG2406>, to offer up<WG399> spiritual<WG4152> sacrifices<WG2378>, acceptable<WG2144> to God<WG2316> through<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.

Because1352, 2532 it is contained<WG4023> in<WG1722> scripture<WG1124>, Behold<WG2400>, I lay<WG5087> in<WG1722> Zion<WG4622> a chief corner<WG204> stone<WG3037>, elect<WG1588>, precious<WG1784>: And<WG2532> he that believeth<WG4100> on<WG1909> him<WG846> shall<WG2617> not3756, 3361 be put to shame<WG2617>.

For you<WG5213> therefore<WG3767> that<WG3588> believe<WG4100> is the preciousness<WG5092>: but<WG1161> for such as disbelieve<WG544>, The stone<WG3037> which<WG3739> the builders<WG3618> rejected<WG593>, The same<WG3778> was<WG1096> made<WG1519> the head<WG2776> of the corner<WG1137>;

and <WG2532>, A stone<WG3037> of stumbling<WG4348>, and<WG2532> a rock<WG4073> of offence<WG4625>; for they<WG3739> stumble<WG4350> at the word<WG3056>, being disobedient<WG544>: whereunto<WG1519> also<WG2532> they were appointed<WG5087>.

But <WG1161> ye<WG5210> are an elect<WG1588> race<WG1085>, a royal<WG934> priesthood<WG2406>, a holy<WG40> nation<WG1484>, a<WG1519> people<WG2992> for God<WG4047>'s own possession, that<WG3704> ye may show forth<WG1804> the excellencies<WG703> of him who called<WG2564> you<WG5209> out of<WG1537> darkness<WG4655> into<WG1519> his<WG846> marvellous<WG2298> light<WG5457>:

who <WG3588> in time past<WG4218> were no<WG3756> people<WG2992>, but<WG1161> now<WG3568> are the people<WG2992> of God<WG2316>: who<WG3588> had<WG1653> not<WG3756> obtained mercy<WG1653>, but<WG1161> now<WG3568> have obtained mercy<WG1653>.

Beloved <WG27>, I beseech<WG3870> you as<WG5613> sojourners<WG3941> and<WG2532> pilgrims<WG3927>, to abstain<WG567> from fleshly<WG4559> lusts<WG1939>, which<WG3748> war<WG4754> against<WG2596> the soul<WG5590>;

having <WG2192> your<WG5216> behavior<WG391> seemly<WG2570> among<WG1722> the Gentiles<WG1484>; that<WG2443>, wherein1722, 3739 they speak against<WG2635> you<WG5216> as<WG5613> evil-doers<WG2555>, they may<WG1392> by<WG1537> your good<WG2570> works<WG2041>, which they behold<WG2029>, glorify<WG1392> God<WG2316> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of visitation<WG1984>.

or <WG1535> unto governors<WG2232>, as<WG5613> sent<WG3992> by<WG1223> him<WG846> for<WG1519> vengeance<WG1557> on evil-doers<WG2555> and<WG1161> for praise<WG1868> to them that do well<WG17>.
For <WG3754> so<WG3779> is<WG2076> the will<WG2307> of God<WG2316>, that by well-doing<WG15> ye should put to silence<WG5392> the ignorance<WG56> of foolish<WG878> men<WG444>:
as <WG5613> free<WG1658>, and<WG2532> not<WG3361> using<WG2192> your freedom<WG1657> for<WG5613> a cloak<WG1942> of wickedness<WG2549>, but<WG235> as<WG5613> bondservants<WG1401> of God<WG2316>.
Honor <WG5091> all<WG3956> men<WG25>. Love the brotherhood<WG81>. Fear<WG5399> God<WG2316>. Honor<WG5091> the king<WG935>.

Servants <WG3610>, be in subjection<WG5293> to<WG1203> your masters<WG1203> with<WG1722> all<WG3956> fear<WG5401>; not<WG3756> only<WG3440> to the good<WG18> and<WG2532> gentle<WG1933>, but<WG235> also<WG2532> to the froward<WG4646>.
For <WG1063> this<WG5124> is acceptable<WG5485>, if<WG1487> for<WG1223> conscience<WG4893> toward God<WG2316> a man<WG5100> endureth<WG5297> griefs<WG3077>, suffering<WG3958> wrongfully<WG95>.

For <WG1063> what<WG4169> glory<WG2811> is it<WG1487>, if, when<WG2532> ye sin<WG264>, and are buffeted<WG2852> for it<WG5278>, ye shall take it patiently? but<WG235> if<WG1487>, when ye do well<WG15>, and<WG2532> suffer<WG3958> for it<WG5278>, ye shall take it patiently, this<WG5124> is acceptable<WG5485> with<WG3844> God<WG2316>.

For1063, 1519 hereunto<WG5124> were ye called<WG2564>: because<WG3754> Christ<WG5547> also<WG2532> suffered<WG3958> for<WG5228> you<WG2257>, leaving<WG5277> you<WG2254> an example<WG5261>, that<WG2443> ye should follow<WG1872> his<WG846> steps<WG2487>:
who <WG3739> did<WG4160> no<WG3756> sin<WG266>, neither<WG3761> was<WG2147> guile<WG1388> found<WG2147> in<WG1722> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750>:

who <WG3739>, when he was reviled<WG3058>, reviled<WG486> not<WG3756> again<WG486>; when he suffered<WG3958> threatened<WG546> not<WG3756>; but<WG1161> committed<WG3860> himself to him that judgeth<WG2919> righteously<WG1346>:

who <WG3739> his own<WG846> self<WG846> bare<WG399> our<WG2257> sins<WG266> in<WG1722> his body<WG4983> upon<WG1909> the tree<WG3586>, that<WG2443> we<WG2198>, having died<WG581> unto sins<WG266>, might live<WG2198> unto righteousness<WG1343>; by<WG3739> whose<WG846> stripes<WG3468> ye were healed<WG2390>.

For <WG1063> ye were<WG2258> going astray<WG4105> like<WG5613> sheep<WG4263>; but<WG235> are<WG1994> now<WG3568> returned<WG1994> unto<WG1909> the Shepherd<WG4166> and<WG2532> Bishop<WG1985> of your<WG5216> souls<WG5590>.
